info.description: Eduframe is a complete solution for commercial training providers & business schools to attract more students, manage & automate the course administration, and deliver the ultimate learning experience. Eduframe seamlessly integrates with Canvas LMS. The connector opens up the opportunity to easily integrate your existing software applications with Eduframe, like your CRM and accounting software.
info.title: Eduframe

email.description: A string representing the billing e-mail of the account.

phone.description: A string representing the phone number of the account.

signup_answers.description: List of signup answers for this account.

address.description: Concatenation of the street and house number.

postal_code.description: A string representing the postal code.

user_id.description: The id of the user that this authentication belongs to.

authentication_provider_id.description: The id of the authentication provider.

uid.description: The unique identifier of this authentication that corresponds the a unique id from the IDP.

otp_enabled.description: In case auth provider is Eduframe, indicates if one time password is enabled for this login, is false for any other providers.
otp_enabled.x-ms-summary: If OTP is enabled for this login.

id.description: Unique identifier of the signup answer.

value.description: The formatted value of the answer.

position.description: Sorting position of the category. Lower is higher.

parent_id.description: Unique identifier of the parent category

is_published.title: Published
is_published.description: If the category should be published on the website.

courses_count.description: Number of courses directly linked to this category.

children_count.description: Number of children categories directly linked to this category.

meta_title.description: The meta title of the category, used for SEO (Search Engine Optimisation) purposes.

meta_description.description: The meta description of the category, used for SEO (Search Engine Optimisation) purposes.

avatar_url.description: URL to a resized avatar image (300x200^).

position.description: Sorting position of the course. Lower is higher.

starting_price.description: Lowest price of all of its planned courses.

signup_url.description: URL to the signup page for this course.

slug.description: Human readable identifier, unique per educator.

slug_history.description: List of old slugs, old calls will be redirected.

avatar.description: URL to a resized avatar image (300x200^).

avatar_thumb_url.description: URL to a resized avatar image (748x296^).

website_url.description: Expected URL of the course on the educator website.

certificate_template_id.description: Identifier of the optionally linked certificate template.

category_id.title: Category
category_id.description: Identifier of the category of the course.

meta_title.description: Meta title of the course for SEO purposes.

meta_description.description: Meta description of the course for SEO purposes.

cost.description: The price to be paid for this course.

cost_scheme.description: How should the course be paid by default.

is_published.description: Boolean representing the publishable status of the course.

user_id.description: The id of the user that this authentication belongs to.

authentication_provider_type.description: The type of the authentication provider.

uid.description: The unique identifier of this authentication that corresponds the a unique id from the IDP.

employee_number.title: Employee number
employee_number.description: The employee number of this user.

phone.title: Phone number
phone.description: The telephone number of the user.

slug.description: The human readable unique identifier, you can also use this to fetch the user.

wants_newsletter.title: Subscribe for newsletter
wants_newsletter.description: Does the user want to receive newsletters?

with_authentication.title: Create authentication
with_authentication.description: Create an authentication for the user, such that the user is able to login.

roles.description: List of roles the user has.

description.description: Long description of the user. (same as teacher_description)

teacher_description.description: Long description of the user. (same as description)

avatar_url.title: Avatar
avatar_url.description: The relative url path to the avatar.

teacher_enrollments_count.description: Number of assigned planned courses as a teacher.

reference_id.description: Reference id of the Invoice. Is used to find the invoice.

number.description: The invoice number which is unique per educator. If left empty, it autoincrements.

number_int.description: The invoice number converted to an integer value.

status.description: The status of the invoice. The initial status will always be concept.

expiration_date.description: The expiration date of the invoice. Is set when the invoice is set to open.

opened_at.description: The date when the invoice status was changed to open.

invoice_set_id.title: Invoice set
invoice_set_id.description: Add this invoice to an invoice set by giving the identifier of the invoice set.

description.description: Human readable description of the invoice.

account_name.description: The name of the account that is paying. Is copied to the invoice and is thus not automatically updated if the account name changes.

total_incl.description: The total cost of the invoice including VAT.

total_excl.description: The total cost of the invoice excluding VAT.

total_open.description: The open cost of the invoice including VAT.

pdf_url.description: Url to the download path of the invoice in PDF format.

xml_url.description: Url to the download path of the invoice in UML format.

feature.description: Some description of the invoice which is displayed on the invoice.

footnote.description: The note displayed at the bottom of the invoice.

id.description: Unique identifier of the invoice item.

units.title: Units
units.description: The number of units of the invoice item.

name.title: Description
name.description: The name of the invoice item.

unit_price.title: Price
unit_price.description: The price of a single unit.

id.description: Unique idenitfier of the invoice vat.
Unique identifier of the catalog variant

product_id.description: Unique identifier of the catalog product

cost_scheme.description: How should the catalog variant be paid by default.

cost.description: The price to be paid for this catalog variant.

currency.description: The currency of the catalog variant.

is_published.title: Published
is_published.description: If the category should be published on the website.

color.title: Color
color.description: Hex code of the color of the label.

model_type.title: Model
model_type.description: The model type for which this label is made available.

id.description: Unique identifier of the webhook. (a UUID).

url.description: The callback url for Eduframe to send a HTTP POST payload to.

events.description: Array of events that should trigger this webhook.

event.description: Type of event that triggerd the webhook.

entity_type.description: Type of the model that triggerd the webhook.

entity_id.description: Unique identifier of the model that triggerd the webhook.
